name: Willy's Wine
description:
I created this game during a  Game Jam in fall of 2017 hosted by  LetsGameDev (Game++ Community Challenge #11). Thanks to the rating of the jury and the community it ended up scoring rank 4 out of 56 entries.   Afterwards I decided to finish the game and  this is what I ended up  with.

Note:

The game should be able to run on almost any computer.  You might encounter problems though when running it alongside OBS. It's a known issue and I am working on it.

F12 toggles fullscreen, by the way ;)
